title: Joe Biden, former vice president and senator, projected as next US president
author: Stephen Loiaconi
description: Joseph R. Biden, who served as vice president for eight years under President Barack Obama, will return to the White House in January as the 46th president of the United States, The Associated Press projects. Biden and Sen. Kamala Harris of California are now projected to have defeated President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence in a bitter and divisive campaign waged in the shadow of the coronavirus pandemic.
cleaned_text: Joe Biden, former vice president and senator, projected as next US president by Stephen Loiaconi Democratic presidential candidate former Vice President Joe Biden arrives to board his campaign plane at New Castle Airport in New Castle, Del., on Election Day, Tuesday, Nov. 3, 2020, en route to Scranton,
